mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exposure_comment_segment (exposure_log_id, segment_index, content, create_time) VALUES (#{exposureLogId}, #{segmentIndex}, #{content}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, exposure_log_id as exposureLogId, segment_index as segmentIndex, content, create_time as createTime FROM exposure_comment_segment WHERE exposure_log_id = #{value} ORDER BY segment_index ASC, id ASC
